newsitem.title: USA: Imagyn says FDA clears fallopian system.
newsitem.headline: Imagyn says FDA clears fallopian system.

text.p: Imagyn Medical Inc said it got marketing clearance from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration for its Ovation Falloposcopy System.
The system provides physicians with a diagnostic tool for further evaluation of proximal fallopian tube occlusion.

This marks the first time the FDA has cleared a device enabling physicians to directly view blockages inside the proximal fallopian tubes -- a major underlying reason for infertility in women. An estimated five million women in the United States are clinically infertile.
